member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.JSON.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.JSON.Decode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.JSON.Encode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of exporting a report to the required format.

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of clicking to design button.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.ActionInteraction
member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of the report viewer interactions (request from user variables, sorting, drill-down).

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.ServerTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates how much time do the report rendering result will be stored in the server cache or session.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.ServerCacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.ServerCacheItemPriority
member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the current visual theme which is used for drawing visual elements of the web viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.CountColumnsParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a count columns in parameters Panel.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.Localization
member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the localization file for the web viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Mvc.StiMvcViewerOptions.RightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which controls of output objects in the right to left mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the web viewer will show the report with scrollbars.

member.summary: Gets or sets a target to open links from the report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a target to open the exported report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that menu animation is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the mode that shows menu of the viewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default mode of the report print destination.

member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of showing a report in the web viewer - one page or the whole report.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report showing zoom. The default value is 100.

member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the web viewer page.
